ISSUE.TITLE: Message template delete button doesn't work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Views/MessageTemplate/Edit.cshtml, I had to add at the end of the file: <nop-delete-confirmation asp-model-id="@Model.Id" asp-button-id="message-template-delete" /> in order to be able to remove a message template. It seems that there is still that missing line into your develop branch.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3031 Message template delete button didn't work
